text: Arianna Talamona (born 5 June 1994) is an Italian Paralympic swimmer who competes in international level events. Talamona was diagnosed with Strumpell- Lorrain disease which affects her spinal cord and uses a wheelchair, she has inherited this medical condition from her mother. Talamona started swimming aged eight to help strengthen her muscles and began competing internationally at the 2011 IPC Swimming European Championships in Berlin where she competed in four events but didn't receive medals. ==References== == External links == * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Varese Category:Paralympic swimmers of Italy Category:Swimmers at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Italian female swimmers Category:Medalists at the World Para Swimming Championships Category:Medalists at the World Para Swimming European Championships
title: Arianna Talamona
